mapper.select:
select sp_num, sp_file, sp_name, sp_address, sp_price
from
( select list.*, rownum as rnum
from (
select s.sp_num, s.sp_file, s.sp_name, s.sp_address, s.sp_price
from tb_space s
, (select sp_num, count(*) c from tb_reserv group by sp_num order by c DESC) r where s.sp_num = r.sp_num and rownum < 7 ) list )
